thread.section_title: MOO.COM Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of MOO.COM | www.moo.com | 4 of 147
thread.title: Stephanie Lawson

author: Stephanie Lawson
title: Stephanie Lawson
text:
Seriously. I've ordered three rounds of business cards from Moo, and they've all been exceedingly high quality and delivered fast for the amount you pay (like 20 bucks for 50 cards) –– And on the rare instances that I was dissatisfied with an order I'd received, including one instance that I honestly explained to them was my mistake (uploaded the wrong design) they comped my order and sent me reprints on next-day delivery for free.
There are some sites out there (like Vistaprint) who offer cheaper services, but they offer nowhere near the amount of customization in regards to materials, card size and shape, etc. that Moo does. It's so worth the extra money to have my cards arrive exactly how I imagined them before ordering.
Their products are awesome, there's a wide variety of customization available, and the cards always arrive in a sturdy (and FREE!) card holder complete with a divider compartment to gather other people's cards! And their customer service team is stellar. I will never order business cards from any other company! :)
